weekly_top_story.headline: U.S. Reaches Cancer Survival Milestone: 7 in 10 Patients Now Survive Five Years or More After Diagnosis
weekly_top_story.summary: The American Cancer Society reports a historic high of 70% five-year survival rate for cancer patients, up from 50% in the 1970s, highlighting decades of progress in treatments and early detection that significantly improves patient outcomes.

stories.headline: President Trump Calls on Congress to Implement 'The Great Healthcare Plan'
stories.summary: President Trump urged Congress to pass legislation enacting sweeping healthcare reforms including drug price reductions, potentially reshaping national policy and access to care.

stories.headline: Flu Hospitalizations Rising in California, Officials Warn
stories.summary: California health officials report increasing flu hospitalizations with projections of further rises, urging vaccinations as cases climb but remain below last year's peak.
